comment: Select the backend to use. Set to 'DEFAULT' to let Flywheel decide.

limitUpdates.comment: Enable or disable instance update limiting with distance.

comment: The number of worker threads to use. Set to -1 to let Flywheel decide. Set to 0 to disable parallelism. Requires a game restart to take effect.

flwBackends.comment: Config options for Flywheel's built-in backends.

comment: How smooth Flywheel's shader-based lighting should be. May have a large performance impact.
Allowed Values: FLAT, TRI_LINEAR, SMOOTH, SMOOTH_INNER_FACE_CORRECTED
